All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractView
Implements the methods of View.
Answer
Yes or No
BeginReportPhaseNotification
notifies the beginning of the report phase
Board
defines the methods to model a board
BoardImpl
a basic Board implementation
BoardPanel
Defines a set of method useful to handle the game board.
BoardPanelImpl
An implementation of a BoardPanel through a JPanel.
BoardTile
a specific tile placed on the board
Cells
this class stores the information regarding the cells of the board, mapping each position to a specific cellType
CellType
the different cell types
Client
a record used for testing purpose containing a queue of messages and a queue of requests
ClientHandler
handle the connection with a specific clients creating a ClientListener and a ClientUpdater
ClientListener
listen for new requests from the client
ClientUpdater
send messages to the client
CloseConnectionRequest
sent to close the connection with the server
ConnectionHandler
Create and handle the connection with the Scarabeo Server by creating a ServerListener and a ServerUpdater.
Controller
The interface Controller defines a set of methods useful to handle View methods
ControllerImpl
The class ControllerImpl implements Controller methods.
CreateLobbyRequest
sent to request the creation of a new lobby
CreateLobbyResponse
a response for a CreateLobbyRequest
CreateOrJoinPanel
An interface that allows the user to create a new Lobby or join to an existing one
EndReportPhaseNotification
notifies the end of the report phase
EndTurnInfo
contains information useful for the end of the turn
EndTurnRequest
sent to end the turn
EndTurnResponse
a response for an EndTurnRequest
Game
defines the methods to model a Game
GameCanceledNotification
notifies the cancellation of a lobby.
GameController
A GameController is a Controller extensions, specifically designed to handle a GameView object.
GameControllerImpl
A simple implementation of GameController
GameEndNotification
notifies the end of the game
GameImpl
a simple game implementation
GameInfo
this class stores information about the game
GameManager
it can be considered the model of the Scarabeo Server.
GameManagerImpl
the basic GameManager implementation
GameStartNotification
notifies the start of the game.
GameView
Defines a set of method useful to handle the game's interface
GameViewImpl
An implementation of GameView through a JFrame
GsonUtils
default serializer/deserializer
Hand
a list of letters
HandPanel
defines a set of method useful to handle operations on the player's hand tiles
HandPanelImpl
an implementation of HandPanel through JPanel
IdGenerator
a generator of ids
IdGeneratorImpl
a basic IdGenerator implementation
ImageButton
A button with an image as background
JoinLobbyInfo
information used to specify which lobby to join
JoinLobbyRequest
request to join an existing lobby
JoinLobbyResponse
a response for a JoinLobbyRequest
LateralPanel
defines a set of method useful to handle different kind of operations during the game.
LateralPanelImpl
A simple implementation of LateralPanel through a JPanel
Lobby
a representation of a lobby that contains the lobby id and the list of users
LobbyPanel
Shows information regarding a specific lobby (e.g., the list of users).
MenuController
A MenuController is a Controller extensions, specifically designed to handle a MenuView object.
MenuControllerImpl
A simple implementation of MenuController
MenuView
Defines a set of method useful to handle the menu's interface
MenuViewImpl
An implementation of MenuView through a JFrame
Message
every message type extends this interface
MessageDeserializer
used to deserialize messages
MessageForwarder
An implementation of MessageHandler that reacts to messages simply forwarding them to a given queue.
MessageHandler
a MessageHandler allows to react to each message in a proper way defined by the programmer.
MessageHandlerImpl
An implementation of MessageHandler that reacts to messages using a MenuController and a GameController
Model
The Scarabeo Client model
ModelImpl
A simple implementation of the Scarabeo client model.
MyTimer
A simple Timer interface
Notification<T>
defines the base structure of a notification
Notification.NotificationMethod
 
PlacedTiles
a list of BoardTiles
Player
an in-game scarabeo's client
PlayerImpl
a simple Player implementation
PlayerImpl.Role
the roles a player can have
PlayersManager
handle the players of a specific game
PlayersManagerImpl
a simple PlayerManager implementation
Position
a pair of int
ProposedWords
a set of words
Rank
contains a ranking (a mapping from userIds to points)
ReportHandler
handle the report mechanism
ReportHandlerImpl
a basic implementation of the ReportHandler
ReportRequest
sent to report a proposed solution
Request<T>
define the base structure of a request
RequestDeserializer
used to deserialize requests
RequestHandler
allows to handle different types of requests
RequestHandlerImpl
the basic RequestHandler implementation
RequestMethod
the possible methods of a request
Response<T>
defines the structure of a response
Response.ResponseMethod
 
Response.Status
 
RunScarabeoServer
 
ScarabeoClient
 
ScarabeoServer
specifies the methods of the scarabeo server
ScarabeoServerImpl
the basic implementation of the scarabeo server
ScarabeoTest
 
ServerCrashedNotification
notifies the crash of the server
ServerInfo
this class stores default server information
ServerListener
Receive messages from a given socket and handle them using a given MessageHandler.
ServerToClientMsg
messages sent from the server to the client
ServerUpdater
Send the requests in the given list through the given socket
StartGameInfo
contains information useful for the start of the game
StartGameRequest
sent by the lobby creator to start the game.
StartGameResponse
a response for a StartGameRequest

Tile

Tile.TypeOfTile
all the possible types of a tile
TilesDistributor

TilesDistributorImpl
A simple TilesDistributor implementation
TimerLabelImpl
A MyTimer implementation showed through a JLabel
Toast
An Android-like Toast message
User
used to represent a user
UserJoinOrLeftLobbyNotification
notifies a change in the users' list
View
Defines a basic set of methods useful for each View.
